summary: I am currently working at Siemens Healthineers, gaining hands-on experience in cutting-edge technologies. I am pursuing B.Tech in CSE from VIT Bhopal University, with a CGPA of 8.72. I have strong interests in backend, cloud computing, and blockchain.
During my internship at RDSO, I implemented RBAC using Django for 200+ users. Iâ€™ve also built projects on blockchain-based crowdfunding and housing for army personnel.
I'm skilled in React, Node.js, Django, Web3, and AWS. I'm an AWS Cloud Practitioner and have solved 900+ coding challenges on LeetCode and Codeforces.
